game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that an invaluable artifact is buried within a long-forgotten ruin. It's time to set out on an adventure to uncover it and bring it back.

task.description: You must find the coordinates or a map leading to the ancient ruins before you can begin your search.
The entrance is said to be guarded by traps. You need to disarm them or find a way around them.
You'll have to explore the ruins and decipher any clues or puzzles that lead to the artifact's hiding place.
